newsitem.title: FRANCE: Air cargo group at Paris airports to meet Dec 12.
newsitem.headline: Air cargo group at Paris airports to meet Dec 12.

text.p: The Comite Interprofessionel du Fret (CIF), a steering group set up by the air cargo community at the Paris airports, Charles de Gaulle and Orly, is to hold its next executive committee meeting on December 12.
CIF's executive committee comprises representatives from France's air freight forwarding agents (SNAGFA), airlines, customs and the Paris airport authority's freight marketing department.

Among the topics on the meeting's agenda will be a review of work undertaken by CIF's five commissions - freight services, quality, logistics, customs and information technology, an CIF official told Reuters. -- Air Cargo Newsroom Tel+44 171 542 7706 Fax+44 171 542 5017
